title: First Age Timeline
description: The First Age of Arda was not actually the first one in the Tolkien universe. There were especially the "Years of the Trees" that took place right before. But the first age has really some important events like the Valar against Melkor and of course the Silmarils.

events.title: Men awake in Hildórien
events.description: Men awake in Hildórien

events.title: Fingolfin camps beside Lake Mithrim
events.description: Fingolfin camps beside Lake Mithrim

events.title: Fingon rescues Maedhros from Thangorodrim
events.description: Fingon, with the help of Thorondor, rescues Maedhros from Thangorodrim.

events.title: Fingolfin becomes High King of the Noldor
events.description: Maedhros waives his claim to the High Kingship of the Noldor. Fingolfin becomes High King of the Noldor.

events.title: Thingol allows House Finarfin to enter Doriath
events.description: Following a visit from Angrod, Thingol allows the House of Finarfin to enter Doriath due to their close kinship with Thingol via Finarfin's wife, Eärwen

events.title: Noldor permission to occupy Hithlum and Dorthonion
events.description: Thingol, as the self-styled Lord of Beleriand, grants the Noldor permission to occupy the Hithlum and Dorthonion, as well as the lands to the east of Doriath.

events.title: Noldor hold council in Mithrim
events.description: The Noldor hold a council in Mithrim to discuss their relations with the Sindar; Angrod and Caranthir have an argument. The Sons of Fëanor decide to relocate to East Beleriand

events.title: Feast of Reuniting
events.description: Fingolfin, High King of the Noldor, hosts Mereth Aderthad - "Feast of Reuniting" - at the Pools of Ivrin. The joyous occasion was designed to create bonds of friendship amongst all the elves of Beleriand.

events.title: Turgon and Finrod sleeping beside Meres of Twilight
events.description: Turgon and Finrod, sleeping beside the Meres of Twilight, receive a dream from Ulmo. The dream urges them to seek places of hidden strength against Morgoth

events.title: Finrod departs Doriath, Galadriel stays in Doriath
events.description: After talking to Thingol, Finrod departs Doriath seeking the caves under the High Faroth. Galadriel stays in Doriath out of friendship for Melian

events.title: Nargothrond created
events.description: Finrod finds the caves and founds the kingdom of Nargothrond. He is named Felagund, "Hewer of Caves", by the Dwarves of the Blue Mountains who help him build his realm

events.title: Dwarves create the Nauglamír
events.description: About the time, the Dwarves create the Nauglamír, the Necklace of the Dwarves, for Finrod Felagund

events.title: Turgon plans city Gondolin
events.description: With the help of Ulmo, Turgon travels up the Sirion and discovers the hidden valley of Tumladen. He plans to create the city of Gondolin, a city similar to Tirion upon Túna

events.title: Third Battle of Beleriand
events.description: The Third Battle of Beleriand: Dagor Aglareb (Glorious Battle). Morgoth is decisively defeated by the Noldor, led by Maedhros and Fingolfin, and the Siege of Angband begins

events.title: Minas Tirith on Tol Sirion
events.description: About this time, Minas Tirith on Tol Sirion is constructed

events.title: Begin construction of Gondolin
events.description: Turgon secretly removes some of his people from Nevrast to begin construction on Gondolin

events.title: Falas cities are build
events.description: The Havens of the Falas, Brithombar and Eglarest, are built anew with the aid of the Noldor. Barad Nimras is constructed to keep a watch on the seas

events.title: Thingol learns of Silmarils from Galadriel
events.description: Thingol learns of the Silmarils from Galadriel and discovers that the Noldor are in exile

events.title: Nargothrond completed
events.description: About this time, Nargothrond is completed and a great feast is held in celebration. Many attend, including Galadriel

events.title: Gondolin completed
events.description: Gondolin is completed and Turgon secretly removes his people from Nevrast

events.title: Ulmo instructs Turgon
events.description: Before Turgon leaves Vinyamar, Ulmo comes to him and instructs Turgon to leave armour and a sword behind. There will be worn as a token by a future warrior to warn him of impending Doom

events.title: Caranthir and Dwarves alliance
events.description: Caranthir encounters the Dwarves of the Blue Mountains and forms an alliance with them. The Dwarves of Nogrod and Belegost begin trading with the Noldor

events.title: Morgoth attacks Fingolfin
events.description: Morgoth sends a small force down the Firth of Drengist to attack the Fingolfin. The orcs are defeated by Fingon and Morgoth, perceiving that orcs are no match for the Noldor, begins to think of other creatures

events.title: Glaurung created
events.description: Glaurung first emerges from Angband, but is pushed back by Fingon. The Long Peace begins

events.title: Telchar forges Dragon-helm
events.description: Around this time, Telchar forges the Dragon-helm for the dwarf-lord Azaghâl

events.title: Bëor the Old
events.description: Birth of Bëor the Old, founder of the House of Bëor

events.title: Marach
events.description: Birth of Marach, founder of the House of Marach/Hador

events.title: Baran
events.description: Birth of Baran

events.title: Belen
events.description: Birth of Belen

events.title: Malach Aradan
events.description: Birth of Malach Aradan

events.title: Bëor enter Beleriand
events.description: Men of the House of Bëor cross the mountains and first enter Beleriand. They are discovered by Finrod Felagund who befriends them. At the request of the Green-elves the men leave Ossiriand and make their home in Estolad

events.title: Imlach
events.description: Birth of Imlach, second son of Marach

events.title: Finrod leaves Estolad
events.description: Finrod leaves Estolad and Bëor decides to go with him. Baran becomes leader of the House of Bëor

events.title: Haladin settle in Thargelion
events.description: The Haladin enter Beleriand and move northwards to settle in Thargelion

events.title: Marach settle in Estolad
events.description: The people of Marach enter Beleriand and settle in Estolad

events.title: Boron
events.description: Birth of Boron

events.title: Haldad
events.description: Birth of Haldad

events.title: Aredhel leaves Gondolin
events.description: Aredhel leaves Gondolin. She gets separated from her escort in Nan Dungortheb and finds herself in the forest of Nan Elmoth. She encounters the dark elf Eöl, who forces her to be his wife

events.title: Beldir
events.description: Birth of Beldir

events.title: Baranor
events.description: Birth of Baranor

events.title: Maeglin
events.description: Birth of Maeglin, son of Aredhel and Eöl

events.title: Malach Aradan leaves Estolad
events.description: Malach Aradan leaves Estolad and settles in Hithlum with the people of Fingolfin. Malach stays there for fourteen years

events.title: Malach Aradan leaves Hithlum
events.description: After fourteen years, Malach Aradan leaves Hithlum and returns to his own people in Estolad

events.title: Amlach
events.description: Birth of Amlach

events.title: Malach Aradan weds Zimrahin
events.description: Malach Aradan weds Zimrahin. She then takes the Sindarin name Meldis

events.title: Boromir
events.description: Birth of Boromir

events.title: Adanel
events.description: Birth of Adanel

events.title: Belemir
events.description: Birth of Belemir

events.title: Belegor
events.description: Birth of Belegor

events.title: Bereg
events.description: Birth of Bereg

events.title: Magor
events.description: Birth of Magor

events.title: Haleth and Haldar
events.description: Birth of the twins Haleth and Haldar

events.title: Haldar
events.description: Death of Bëor the Old

events.title: Bregor
events.description: Birth of Bregor

events.title: Andreth
events.description: Birth of Andreth

events.title: Beril
events.description: Birth of Beril

events.title: Hathol
events.description: Birth of Hathol

events.title: Haldan
events.description: Birth of Haldan

events.title: Amlach enters service of Maedhros
events.description: Following a great council of Men, Bereg leads a thousand of his people southwards away from Estolad whereas Amlach enters the service of Maedhros

events.title: Beren (son of Belemir)
events.description: Birth of Beren, son of Belemir and grandfather of beren (lover of Lúthien)

events.title: Battle of the Gelion-Ascar Stockade
events.description: Orcs besiege the Haladin in Thargelion. In the ensuing battle, the orcs are defeated by Caranthir's people

events.title: Haldad and Haldar
events.description: Death of Haldad and Haldar

events.title: Caranthir suggested to Haleth
events.description: Caranthir suggested to Haleth, daughter of Haldad and leader of the Haladin, that her people move to his lands. She thanks Caranthir but leads her people westwards

events.title: Marach
events.description: Death of Marach, founder of the House of Marach

events.title: Haladin settle in Estolad
events.description: The Haladin settle in Estolad

events.title: Baran
events.description: Death of Baran

events.title: Bregil
events.description: Birth of Bregil

events.title: Hirwen
events.description: Birth of Hirwen

events.title: Haladin to Brethil
events.description: Haleth leads the Haladin to Brethil

events.title: Hador
events.description: Birth of Hador Lórindol

events.title: Halmir
events.description: Birth of Halmir

events.title: Bregolas
events.description: Birth of Bregolas

events.title: Gilwen
events.description: Birth of Gilwen

events.title: Malach Aradan
events.description: Death of Malach Aradan

events.title: Eöl attempts to kill Maeglin
events.description: Whilst Eöl is in the mountains feasting with the dwarves, Aredhel and Maeglin escape Nan Elmoth and go to Gondolin. They are secretly followed by Eöl who is then given the choice to either stay in Gondolin or to die. Eöl attempts to kill Maeglin but Aredhel jumps in front of the dart.

events.title: Aredhel
events.description: Death of Aredhel

events.title: Eöl
events.description: Eöl is cast off the Caragdûr for killing Aredhel. Death of Eöl

events.title: Barahir
events.description: Birth of Barahir

events.title: Orcs defeated at Pass of Aglon
events.description: Orcs try to break through the Pass of Aglon. They are defeated by Maedhros, Maglor, the sons of Finarfin and Bëor

events.title: Hador enters service of Fingolfin
events.description: Hador enters the service of Fingolfin

events.title: Emeldir
events.description: Birth of Emeldir

events.title: Boron
events.description: Death of Boron

events.title: Athrabeth Finrod ah Andreth
events.description: "Athrabeth Finrod ah Andreth", the Debate of Finrod and Andreth, takes place

events.title: Brandir
events.description: Birth of Brandir, son of Arachon and Bregil, uncle to Brandir the Lame

events.title: Boromir first Lord of Ladros
events.description: The region of Ladros in Dorthonion is given to the House of Bëor. Boromir becomes the first Lord of Ladros

events.title: Beldis
events.description: Birth of Beldis

events.title: Haldir
events.description: Birth of Haldir, Chieftain of the Haladin

events.title: Hador 10 years service of Fingolfin
events.description: Hador completes ten years of services with Fingolfin

events.title: Glóredhel
events.description: Birth of Glóredhel

events.title: Hador gets Lorship of Dor-lómin
events.description: Fingolfin grants Hador the Lorship of Dor-lómin

events.title: Beleth
events.description: Birth of Beleth

events.title: Galdor
events.description: Birth of Galdor the Tall

events.title: Hundar
events.description: Birth of Hundar

events.title: Gundor
events.description: Birth of Gundor

events.title: Haleth
events.description: Death of Haleth

events.title: Haldan gets Haladin Chieftain
events.description: Haldan becomes the 3rd Chieftain of the Haladin

events.title: Baragund
events.description: Birth of Baragund

events.title: Hareth
events.description: Birth of Hareth

events.title: Belegund
events.description: Birth of Belegund

events.title: Boromir
events.description: Death of Boromir (Lord of Ladros)

events.title: Bregor 2nd Lord of Ladros
events.description: Bregor becomes the 5th Head of the House of Bëor and 2nd Lord of Ladros

events.title: Beren
events.description: Birth of Beren

events.title: Double marriage
events.description: At a feast, a double marriage is held between Galdor and Hareth, and between Haldir and Glóredhel

events.title: Húrin
events.description: Birth of Húrin

events.title: Handir
events.description: Birth of Handir

events.title: Hunleth
events.description: Birth of Hunleth

events.title: Morwen
events.description: Birth of Morwen Eledhwen

events.title: Huor
events.description: Birth of Huor

events.title: Hundad
events.description: Birth of Hundad

events.title: Bregor
events.description: Death of Bregor

events.title: Rían
events.description: Rían is born

events.title: Haldan
events.description: Death of Haldan

events.title: Dagor Bragollach
events.description: The Fourth Battle of Beleriand: Dagor Bragollach (Battle of the Sudden Flame). Morgoth breaks the Siege of Angband marking the end of Long Peace

events.title: Ard-galen destroyed
events.description: The Ard-galen is destroyed by Morgoth's rivers of fire and is renamed the Anfauglith, the Gaping Dust

events.title: Glaurung leads army
events.description: Glaurung leads forth an army of balrogs and orcs. The Noldor suffer heavy losses and are scattered across Beleriand

events.title: Finrod Felagund cut off
events.description: Finrod Felagund is cut off from the rest of army in the Fen of Serech; he is saved by Barahir. Thereafter, oaths are made between Barahir and Finrod and Barahir receives a ring which becomes an heirloom

events.title: Dorthonion is lost
events.description: Dorthonion is lost and its people remove to Hithlum. Celegorm and Curufin are defeated and flee to Nargothrond. Orcs capture Mount Rerir, destroy Thargelion and defile Lake Helevorn; Caranthir removes to Amon Ereb.

events.title: Angrod and 4 others
events.description: Death of Angrod, Aegnor, Bregolas, Hador and Gundor

events.title: Gelmir is captured
events.description: Gelmir is captured

events.title: Turgon sends ships to Valinor
events.description: Turgon, learning of the battle, sends ships to Valinor to ask for aid. No aid comes and few ships return

events.title: Fingolfin
events.description: Death of Fingolfin in single combat with Morgoth. Thorondor bears Fingolfin's body away and he is buried by his son Turgon in a cairn overlooking Gondolin

events.title: Gil-galad to Havens of the Falas
events.description: Gil-galad, a young child, is sent to the Havens of the Falas for protection

events.title: Barahir forms group
events.description: Barahir refuses to give up on Dorthonion and forms a group of outlaws who seek to thwart the designs of Morgoth. There are thirteen members of the group: Dagnir, Ragnor, Radhruin, Dairuin, Gildor, Gorlim the Unhappy, Urthel, Arthad, Hathaldir; Barahir, his son Beren, and his kinsmen Belegund and Baragund

events.title: Emeldir away from Dorthonion
events.description: Emeldir, wife of Barahir, leads their people out of Dorthonion to Brethil. Some, including Morwen and Rían, continue on to Dor-lómin

events.title: Orodreth defeated
events.description: Orodreth is defeated in his defence of Minas Tirith upon Tol Sirion. Sauron takes the island and renames it Tol-in-Gaurhoth, "Isle of Werewolves"

events.title: Orcs in Brethil
events.description: A legion of orcs passes into Brethil and is defeated by the Haladin with the aid of Beleg of Doriath

events.title: Húrin and Huor enter Gondolin
events.description: Following the battle, Húrin and Huor become lost and cross the Brithiach and wander into Dimbar. Spotted by Thorondor, they are rescued and taken to Gondolin

events.title: Húrin and Huor leave Gondolin
events.description: Húrin and Huor depart Gondolin and return home to Dor-lómin. They tell no-one where they have been or what they saw

events.title: Gorlim tricked by Sauron
events.description: Out of a desire to see his wife, Gorlim is tricked by Sauron into betraying Barahir's band of outlaws.

events.title: Barahir and 11 others
events.description: Death of Barahir, Baragund, Belegund, Arthad, Dagnir, Dairuin, Gildor, Gorlim, Hathaldir, Radhruin, Ragnor, Urthel

events.title: Beren retrieves ring
events.description: Beren, the only survivor, hunts down the orcs and retrieves his father's ring

events.title: Morgoth sends army
events.description: Morgoth sends an army of orcs to attack Hithlum

events.title: Galdor
events.description: Death of Galdor

events.title: Húrin Lord of Dor-lómin
events.description: Húrin becomes the 3rd Lord of Dor-lómin.

events.title: Húrin pursues orcs across Anfauglith
events.description: Húrin pursues the orcs across the Anfauglith whilst Círdan sends aid to Fingon. Victory for the Eldar

events.title: Easterlings enter Beleriand
events.description: Easterlings, led by Bór and Ulfang, enter Beleriand and ally themselves with Maedhros and Caranthir. Bór remained true but Ulfang is secretly in league with Morgoth

events.title: Sauron over-runs Dorthonion
events.description: Sauron over-runs Dorthonion with wraiths, werewolves and other foul creatures. With a price on his head, Beren is forced to flee Dorthonion and comes to Doriath

events.title: Húrin and Morwen
events.description: Marriage of Húrin and Morwen. Túrin is born later in the year.

events.title: Túrin
events.description: Birth of Túrin

events.title: Beren sees Lúthien
events.description: Beren sees Lúthien for the first time and becomes enchanted

events.title: Beren and Lúthien
events.description: Beren hears Lúthien singing and awakes from his trance. They fall in love

events.title: Thingol commands Beren
events.description: Thingol commands Beren to return with a Silmaril in exchange for Lúthien's hand in marriage. Quest for the Silmari

events.title: Beren enters Nargothrond
events.description: Beren departs Nargothrond with Finrod and ten companions (including Edrahil). Finrod appoints Orodreth as regent

events.title: Beren, Finrod and companions captured by Sauron
events.description: Arriving at Tol-in-Gaurhoth, Beren, Finrod and companions are captured by Sauron

events.title: Lúthien leaves Doriath
events.description: Lúthien leaves Doriath seeking Beren; she encounters Celegorm and Curufin who take her to Nargothrond. She escapes Nargothrond with the aid of Huan

events.title: Finrod and 10 others
events.description: Death of Finrod and his ten companions in Tol-in-Gaurhoth

events.title: Huan and Lúthien in Tol-in-Gaurhoth
events.description: Huan and Lúthien arrive at Tol-in-Gaurhoth.

events.title: Huan kills Draugluin
events.description: Huan kills Draugluin and defeats wolf-Sauron in battle; Sauron flees in the form of a vampire and goes to Taur-nu-Fuin

events.title: Beren leaves for Angband
events.description: Celegorm and Curufin are banished from Nargothrond and subsequently attack Beren and Lúthien. Huan betrays his master out of love for Lúthien. Beren leaves for Angband

events.title: Lalaith
events.description: Birth of Lalaith

events.title: Beren and Lúthien travel to Angband
events.description: Beren travels to Angband by himself but Huan brings Lúthien to him. Beren and Lúthien travel to Angband disguised as Draugluin and Thuringwethil

events.title: Beren steals Silmaril
events.description: Passing Carcharoth, Lúthien puts Morgoth under a spell and Beren takes a Silmaril from the Iron Crown

events.title: Beren and Lúthien rescued by Thorondor
events.description: Trying to escape, Carcharoth bites off Beren's hand holding the Silmaril. The Silmaril hurts Carcharoth. Beren and Lúthien are rescued by Thorondor and the eagles who take them to Doriath

events.title: Carcharoth hunted
events.description: Thingol, Beren, Beleg, Mablung and Huan hunt Carcharoth to retrieve the Silmaril

events.title: Huan kills Carcharoth
events.description: Carcharoth mortally wounds Beren. Huan kills Carcharoth who dies in the process

events.title: Thingol gets Silmaril
events.description: Thingol receives the Silmaril

events.title: Beren
events.description: Death of Beren

events.title: Lúthien
events.description: Lúthien lays down her life and goes to the Halls of Mandos to plead for Beren

events.title: Hunthor
events.description: Birth of Hunthor

events.title: Union of Maedhros
events.description: The Union of Maedhros is formed

events.title: Beren and Lúthien return to Middle-earth
events.description: Beren and Lúthien return to Middle-earth, both mortal. They inhabit Tol Galen and the area becomes known as Dor Firn-i-Guinar, "the Land of the Dead that Live"

events.title: Union of Maedhros clears Beleriand
events.description: The Union of Maedhros clears Beleriand of orcs, but in doing so reveals the Eldar's full strength to Morgoth

events.title: Túrin falls ill
events.description: The Evil Breath is unleashed from Angband and Túrin falls ill

events.title: Lalaith
events.description: Death of Lalaith

events.title: Manthor
events.description: Birth of Manthor

events.title: Dior
events.description: Birth of Dior

events.title: Hardang
events.description: Birth of Hardang

events.title: Halmir
events.description: Death of Halmir

events.title: Huor and Rían
events.description: Marriage of Huor and Rían

events.title: Nirnaeth Arnoediad
events.description: The Fifth Battle of Beleriand: Nirnaeth Arnoediad (Battle of Unnumbered Tears). The army of elves, men and dwarves are betrayed by Ulfang causing their defeat. The armies suffer heavy losses in the face of Morgoth's orcs, dragons and balrogs

events.title: Fingon
events.description: Fingon dies in battle with Gothmog, Lord of Balrogs

events.title: Azaghâl
events.description: Azaghâl dies in battle with Glaurung

events.title: Huor
events.description: Death of Huor,Hundar,Haldir,Gelmir,Uldor,Ulfast,Ulwarth,Borlach,Borlad,Borthand

events.title: Morgoth taunts Húrin
events.description: Húrin and Gwindor are captured. Húrin refuses to tell Morgoth the location of Gondolin; Morgoth taunts Húrin at the Haudh-en-Ndengin

events.title: Fingon returns to Gondolin
events.description: Turgon succeeds Fingon as High King of the Noldor in Middle-earth and returns to Gondolinn

events.title: Tuor
events.description: Birth of Tuor. Rían commits Tuor to the care of the elf Annael.

events.title: Rían
events.description: Rían goes to the Haudh-en-Ndengin and dies

events.title: Glóredhel
events.description: Death of Glóredhel

events.title: Túrin to Doriath
events.description: Túrin sent to Doriath by his mother Morwen

events.title: Nienor
events.description: Nienor is born

events.title: Túrin arrives in Doriath
events.description: Túrin arrives in Doriath and is welcomed by Thingol as a foster-son

events.title: Morgoth sends force
events.description: Morgoth sends a force to Brithombar and Eglarest which are subsequently destroyed, and Barad Nimras is cast down

events.title: Base at Mouths of Sirion
events.description: Círdan, Gil-galad and other survivors retreat to the Isle of Balar but keep a base at the Mouths of Sirion

events.title: Círdan builds seven ships
events.description: Círdan builds seven ships and Turgon sends them Valinor to ask for help. All are lost save Voronwë, who is washed ashore in Nevrast

events.title: Túrin becomes companion of Beleg
events.description: Túrin becomes a companion of Beleg and joins him in battle. Túrin dons the Dragon-helm of Dor-lómin for the first time

events.title: Saeros
events.description: After taunting Túrin, Saeros falls into a chasm and dies.

events.title: Túrin leaves Doriath
events.description: Unbeknownst to Túrin, he is pardoned by Thingol. However, Túrin flees Doriath; Beleg goes in search of him

events.title: Túrin kills Forweg
events.description: Túrin kills Forweg, leader of the Gaurwaith, after chasing down a young woman. Túrin assumes the leadership of the outlaws.

events.title: Beleg leaves Túrin
events.description: Beleg leaves Túrin to return to Doriath. Beleg is unable to persuade Túrin to come with him, despite telling Túrin that he has been pardoned by Thingol

events.title: Orcs enter Brethil
events.description: Increasing numbers of orcs enter Brethil; the Gaurwaith are forced southwards down the old South Road

events.title: Outlaws encounter Mim
events.description: The Outlaws encounter the petty-dwarf Mîm who offers them his home Amon Rûdh in return for his life. In is known as Bar-en-Danwedh, the House of Ransom

events.title: Khîm
events.description: Death of Khîm

events.title: Beleg returns to Túrin
events.description: Beleg returns to Túrin with the Dragon-helm of Dor-lómin. Fighting side-by-side around Amon Rûdh, the area becomes known as Dor-Cúarthol, the Land of Bow and Helm

events.title: Tuor captured
events.description: Annael and the elves of Androth leave Hithlum for the Havens of Sirion. The elves escape but Tuor is captured

events.title: Tuor becomes thrall of Lorgan
events.description: Tuor is made a thrall of Lorgan, chief of the Easterlings in Hithlum

events.title: Gwindor released
events.description: Gwindor is released from Angband

events.title: Mîm betrays Túrin
events.description: Mîm betrays Túrin who taken captive by orcs. Beleg pursues the orcs and encounters Beleg on the road

events.title: Túrin rescued by Beleg
events.description: Túrin is rescued by Beleg

events.title: Beleg
events.description: Túrin mistakenly kills Beleg and takes his sword, Anglachel

events.title: Túrin to Nargothrond
events.description: Gwindor leads Túrin to Nargothrond. Túrin, known as Mormegil, becomes a great captain of the people of Nargothrond

events.title: Tuor escapes
events.description: After three years of captivity, Tuor escapes from his thralldom under Lorgan the Easterling. Tuor hides in the caves of Androth

events.title: Morwen and Nienor to Doriath
events.description: Morwen and Nienor travel to Doriath seeking news of Túrin. There is no news of Túrin in Doriath, but Thingol allows Morwen and Nienor to stay in Doriath as his guests

events.title: Tuor leaves Hithlum
events.description: Tuor leaves Hithlum and encounters Gelmir and Arminas who show Tuor the way to the Gate of the Noldor. Tuor passes through Drengist and, coming to Nevrast, becomes the first Man to see Belegaer, the Great Sea

events.title: Gelmir and Arminas to Nargothrond
events.description: Gelmir and Arminas, messengers sent by Círdan, come to Nargothrond bearing a message from Ulmo. They advise Orodreth to close the gate and throw down the bridge. Túrin rejects the advice

events.title: Handir
events.description: Orcs attack the Forest of Brethil and kill Handir. Brandir becomes the new Chieftain of the Haladin

events.title: Battle of Tumhalad
events.description: Morgoth unleashes an army on Nargothrond led by Glaurung. After burning the Talath Dirnen, The Battle of Tumhalad takes place. The elves are defeated, and Orodreth and Gwindor. Túrin is protected by the Dragon-helm

events.title: Nargothrond destroyed
events.description: Túrin returns to witness the Fall of Nargothrond. Nargothrond is completely destroyed and all remaining elves are killed or captured

events.title: Túrin taunted
events.description: Túrin falls under Glaurung's spell and instead of protecting Finduilas he returns to Dor-lómin to seek Morwen and Nienor.

events.title: Finduilas
events.description: Finduilas is taken by orcs and is killed at the Crossings of the Taeglin. The Haladin build a mound over her grave: Haudh-en-Elleth

events.title: Tuor encounters Ulmo
events.description: Tuor encounters Ulmo who instructs him to deliver a message to Turgon in Gondolin

events.title: Tuor meets Voronwë
events.description: Tuor meets Voronwë who agrees to take Tuor to Gondolin

events.title: Fell Winter
events.description: The Fell Winter

events.title: Tuor and Voronwë reach Pools of Ivrin
events.description: Tuor and Voronwë reach the Pools of Ivrin and spot Túrin

events.title: Tuor and Voronwë hide from orcs
events.description: Tuor and Voronwë hide from orcs travelling on the Old South Road

events.title: Tuor and Voronwë on Dry River
events.description: Tuor and Voronwë travel up the Dry River

events.title: Tuor and Voronwë come to Gondolin
events.description: After passing the Seven Gates, Tuor and Voronwë come to Gondolin. Tuor delivers Ulmo's message to Turgon but Turgon decides to stay

events.title: Túrin returns to Dor-lómin
events.description: Túrin returns to Dor-lómin and discovers that Morwen and Nienor had left for Doriath. In a rage, Túrin kills Brodda the Easterling. Aerin dies in the fire in Brodda's hall

events.title: Túrin comes to Brethil
events.description: Túrin, searching for Finduilas, comes to the Brethil and discovers that Finduilas had been killed by orcs. He stays in Brethil and takes the name Turambar

events.title: Níniel and Morwen missing
events.description: Mablung the Hunter leads a party from Doriath to Nargothrond; it is waylaid by Glaurung and Niënor Níniel and Morwen Eledhwen are lost in the wild.

events.title: Niënor taunted
events.description: Niënor falls under Glaurung's spell and forgets her identity. She is found by Túrin Turambar and comes to Brethil

events.title: Turin asks Nienor to marry
events.description: Túrin asks Nienor to marry him. Under Brandir's advice, she delays

events.title: Dior and Nimloth
events.description: Marriage of Dior and Nimloth

events.title: Túrin and Niënor
events.description: Mid-year's Day - After becoming betrothed in the spring, Túrin Turambar weds Niënor Níniel

events.title: Orcs raiding Brethil
events.description: Glaurung's orcs begin raiding Brethil. Túrin initially refuses to go into battle, but is persuaded by Dorlas. Túrin takes up Gurthang and defeats the orcs; news of the Black Sword reaches Glaurung

events.title: Glaurung approaches Brethil
events.description: Glaurung issues forth from Nargothrond and approaches Brethil

events.title: Níniel conceives
events.description: Níniel conceives with Túrin's child

events.title: Túrin search of Glaurung
events.description: Túrin, with Hunthor and Dorlas, goes in search of Glaurung.

events.title: Hunthor
events.description: Hunthor is killed by a falling rock

events.title: Dorlas
events.description: Dorlas is killed by Brandir for deserting Túrin

events.title: Glaurung
events.description: Túrin finds Glaurung and kills the dragon

events.title: Níniel
events.description: With his dying words, Glaurung reveals to Níniel that she is Nienor and Túrin is her brother. She commits suicide by throwing herself off the Cabed-en-Aras into the river Taeglin. Brandir witnesses this

events.title: Brandir
events.description: Brandir tells Túrin that his wife is also his sister. Túrin disbelieves him and kills Brandir in anger

events.title: Túrin
events.description: Túrin learns from Mablung that Brandir spoke the truth. Túrin commits suicide by falling on his sword

events.title: Haladin erect grave
events.description: The Haladin erect a grave to Túrin and Nienor

events.title: Morgoth releases Húrin
events.description: Following the death of his children, Morgoth releases Húrin from captivity. Húrin goes to Hithlum

events.title: Eluréd and Elurín
events.description: Birth of Eluréd and Elurín, twin sons of Dior

events.title: Húrin leaves Hithlum
events.description: Húrin leaves Hithlum with Asgon and six others. They seek Gondolin and accidentally reveal its rough location to Morgoth

events.title: Húrin meets Morwen
events.description: Húrin heads to Brethil and meets Morwen at their children's grave just before she dies

events.title: Húrin imprisoned
events.description: Húrin is imprisoned by the Haladin and accuses them of failing to help his family.

events.title: Hardang and Manthor
events.description: A revolt occurs and the Chieftain, Hardang, is killed as is Húrin's friend Manthor

events.title: Húrin leaves Brethil
events.description: With the Haladin leaderless, and Ephel Brandir in ruins, Húrin heads towards his children's grave and leaves Brethil

events.title: Mîm
events.description: Húrin goes to Nargothrond and slays Mîm. He takes the treasure of Nargothrond, including the Nauglamír

events.title: Hurin to Doriath
events.description: Húrin takes the treasure to Doriath and casts the Nauglamír at Thingol's feet.

events.title: Hurin leaves Doriath
events.description: Realising from Melian that he has been acting evilly due to Morgoth, Húrin leaves Doriath and casts himself into the Sea

events.title: Nauglamír with Silmaril
events.description: Thingol commissions the Dwarves to remake the Nauglamír with the Silmaril.

events.title: Thingol
events.description: The Dwarves steal the Nauglamír and kill Thingol

events.title: Dwarves pursued by Elves
events.description: The Dwarves are pursued by the Elves; all but two dwarves are killed, who return to Nogrod. The Nauglamir is returned to Menegroth

events.title: Melian leaves Middle-earth
events.description: Melian leaves Middle-earth. The Girdle of Melian is withdrawn leaving Doriath unprotected

events.title: Tuor weds Idril
events.description: Second Union of Elves and Men: Tuor marries Idril in Gondolin

events.title: Battle of the Thousand Caves
events.description: The Dwarves of Nogrod enter Doriath and attack Menegroth. In the Battle of the Thousand Caves the elves are defeated and the dwarves take the Nauglamír

events.title: Mablung
events.description: Mablung is slain

events.title: Battle of Sarn Athrad
events.description: Beren leads and army of Ents and Elves at the Battle of Sarn Athrad. The Dwarves are defeated and Beren returns to Ossiriand with the Nauglamír

events.title: Elwing
events.description: Birth of Elwing

events.title: Dior becomes King
events.description: Dior removes to Doriath and becomes King. His family go with him

events.title: Eärendil
events.description: Birth of Eärendil

events.title: Beren and Lúthien
events.description: Death of Beren and Lúthien

events.title: Dior gets Nauglamír
events.description: A messenger brings Dior the Nauglamír

events.title: Fëanor requests Silmaril
events.description: Learning that the Silmaril is in Doriath, the Sons of Fëanor send message to Dior requesting the return of the Silmaril. Dior does not answer

events.title: Second Kinslaying
events.description: The Second Kinslaying. The Sons of Fëanor attach Doriath seeking the Silmaril

events.title: Dior slays Celegorm, Curufin and Caranthir
events.description: Dior slays Celegorm, Curufin and Caranthir

events.title: Dior and Nimloth
events.description: Dior, and his wife Nimloth, are killed

events.title: Eluréd and Elurín
events.description: Eluréd and Elurín are abandoned to die

events.title: Elwing saves Silmaril
events.description: Elwing flees Doriath with the last Silmaril

events.title: Doriath destroyed
events.description: Doriath is utterly destroyed following the Second Kinslaying

events.title: Elwing to Mouths of Sirion
events.description: Elwing, with a remnant of the people of Doriath, arrive at the Mouths of Sirion with the Silmaril

events.title: Maeglin captured
events.description: Maeglin is captured by orcs and taken to Angband

events.title: Maeglin reveals Gondolin location
events.description: Maeglin reveals to Morgoth the location of Gondolin; in return, Morgoth promises that Maeglin will rule Gondolin as a vassal and have possession of Idril

events.title: Fall of Gondolin
events.description: The Fall of Gondolin: Morgoth attacks Gondolin with an army of orcs, dragons, wolves and balrogs

events.title: Ecthelion, Gothmog and Glorfindel
events.description: Ecthelion dies killing Gothmog, Lord of Balrogs. Glorfindel dies killing a balrog

events.title: Turgon, Penlod, Duilin, Rog, Orcobal, Balcmeg, Othrod and Lug
events.description: Deaths of Turgon, Penlod, Duilin, Rog, Orcobal, Balcmeg, Othrod and Lug

events.title: Maeglin
events.description: Maeglin takes Idril and Eärendil. Tuor kills Maeglin

events.title: Idril and Tuor survives
events.description: Idril and Tuor lead a group of survivors out a secret tunnel and across the Cirith Thoronath. They lead the people towards the Mouths of Sirion

events.title: Gil-galad High King of the Noldor
events.description: Gil-galad becomes High King of the Noldor

events.title: Tuor, Idril, Eärendil to the Mouths of Sirion
events.description: Tuor, Idril, Eärendil and the refugees from Gondolin arrive at the Mouths of Sirion

events.title: Silmaril at Mouths of Sirion
events.description: Maedhros learns that the Silmaril is at the Mouths of Sirion, but he does not immediately act - and forswears the Oath - out of guilt for their actions in Doriath

events.title: Eärendil and Elwing
events.description: Marriage of Eärendil and Elwing

events.title: Tuor and Idril leave Middle-earth
events.description: Tuor and Idril set sail in their ship, Eärrámë, and leave Middle-earth for Valinor. Alone of all men, Tuor is said to be counted among the Eldar

events.title: Sons of Fëanor tormented by oath
events.description: The remaining Sons of Fëanor - Maedhros, Maglor and Amras - begin to feel tormented by their unfulfilled oath

events.title: Elrond and Elros
events.description: Birth of Elrond and Elros, twin sons of Eärendil and Elwing

events.title: Eärendil searching for Valinor
events.description: Eärendil begins his voyages in his ship Vingilótë, searching for Valinor and his parents

events.title: Third Kinslaying
events.description: The Third Kinslaying: the remaining sons of Fëanor, desiring the Silmaril, attack the remnants of Doriath and Gondolin at the New Havens

events.title: Círdan and Gil-galad send aid
events.description: Círdan and Gil-galad send aid to the Havens. The arrive too late and the people are defeated; the refugees move to the Isle of Balar

events.title: Amrod
events.description: Death of Amrod

events.title: Elrond and Elros taken captive
events.description: Elrond and Elros are taken captive by Maglor, but Maglor comes to love the boys and fosters them

events.title: Elwing casts into sea
events.description: Elwing, bearing the Silmaril, casts herself into the sea. Ulmo bears her up in the likeness of a swan and she finds Eärendil

events.title: Morgoth controls all of Beleriand
events.description: The last free elves and men flee to the Isle of Balar. Morgoth controls all of Beleriand

events.title: Eärendil and Elwing to Aman
events.description: Eärendil and Elwing reach Aman. Eärendil delivers the message of the Two Kindreds to the Valar

events.title: Valar help peoples of Middle-earth
events.description: The Valar answer Eärendil and agree to help the peoples of Middle-earth against Morgoth

events.title: Eärendil and Elwing now elves
events.description: Eärendil and Elwing are told that they must choose which Kindred to be counted amongst. The both choose to be counted as elves. The choice is also extended to their sons, Elrond and Elros

events.title: Eärendil on ship Vingilótë
events.description: Wearing the Silmaril, Eärendil is borne up in his ship Vingilótë as a Star to provide hope to the peoples of Middle-earth

events.title: War of Wrath
events.description: The War of Wrath. The Host of the Valar, led by Eönwë, reach Beleriand aboard ships made by the Teleri. The Great Battle against Morgoth begins

events.title: Beleriand destroyed
events.description: Beleriand is destroyed during the War of Wrath and Morgoth is defeated and nearly all the dragons and balrogs are killed

events.title: Ancalagon
events.description: Ancalagon the Black is destroyed by Eärendil. Ancalagon's body falls from the sky and destroys Thangorodrim.

events.title: Beleriand sinks
events.description: Much of Beleriand sinks beneath the sea

events.title: Eönwë takes Silmarils
events.description: Eönwë takes the Silmarils from Morgoth. Morgoth's Iron Crown is beat into a collar around his neck and attached to Angainor

events.title: Maedhros and Maglor
events.description: Maedhros and Maglor steal the Silmarils. The Silmarils burn their hands and Maedhros jumps into a fiery chasm with his Silmaril whilst Maglor casts his Silmaril into the sea. The fate of Maglor is unknown

events.title: Morgoth
events.description: Morgoth is thrust through the Door of Night into the Void

events.title: Valar leaves Middle-earth
events.description: The Host of the Valar leaves Middle-earth and summons the elves to remove to Aman. Círdan, Galadriel and Celeborn, Celebrimbor, Gil-galad and Elrond all elect to remain

events.title: First Age ends
events.description: The First Age ends
